summary: The text provides resources and design inspirations for a collaborative document management system. It includes links to articles explaining real-time collaborative editing, design examples from Dribbble, and icon resources from Flaticon. Functionality includes metadata tagging, AI-powered search, collaborative editing, classifying documents and sentiment analysis. Document upload is supported in PDF and DOCX formats. Color palette information is also listed.
